refnamediv.refpurpose: Prints a list of all the memory blocks that have been allocated and recorded in the memdebug table.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Prints a list of all the memory blocks that have been allocated and recorded in the memdebug table. Memory allocation is not normally recorded in the memdebug table, but executing the debugbu 2 command will turn on the <MEM_CHECK> flag, and as long as that flag is set, all memory allocation will be recorded.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the debugmem command to list allocated memory blocks.
